body:
### Problem
The x64 emulator's performance is unbearable, even on a powerful chip like M3 Pro. I would suggest Neovim to provide a windows/arm64 binary.
I got the following error when executing command `cmake -B build -G Ninja -D CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release` from [BUILD.md](https://github.com/neovim/neovim/blob/master/BUILD.md#windows--msvc-powershell):

```shell
-- The C compiler identification is MSVC 19.42.34435.0
-- Detecting C compiler ABI info
-- Detecting C compiler ABI info - failed
-- Check for working C compiler: C:/Program Files/Microsoft Visual Studio/2022/Professional/VC/Tools/MSVC/14.42.34433/bin/Hostarm64/x64/cl.exe
-- Check for working C compiler: C:/Program Files/Microsoft Visual Studio/2022/Professional/VC/Tools/MSVC/14.42.34433/bin/Hostarm64/x64/cl.exe - broken
CMake Error at C:/Strawberry/c/share/cmake-3.29/Modules/CMakeTestCCompiler.cmake:67 (message):
  The C compiler

    "C:/Program Files/Microsoft Visual Studio/2022/Professional/VC/Tools/MSVC/14.42.34433/bin/Hostarm64/x64/cl.exe"

  is not able to compile a simple test program.

  It fails with the following output:

    Change Dir: 'C:/Users/ares/source/repos/neovim/build/CMakeFiles/CMakeScratch/TryCompile-dkvt3o'

    Run Build Command(s): C:/PROGRA~1/MICROS~1/2022/PROFES~1/Common7/IDE/COMMON~1/MICROS~1/CMake/Ninja/ninja.exe -v cmTC_3e848
    [1/2] C:\PROGRA~1\MICROS~1\2022\PROFES~1\VC\Tools\MSVC\1442~1.344\bin\HOSTAR~1\x64\cl.exe  /nologo   /DWIN32 /D_WINDOWS  /Zi /Ob0 /Od /RTC1 -MDd /showIncludes /FoCMakeFiles\cmTC_3e848.dir\testCCompiler.c.obj /FdCMakeFiles\cmTC_3e848.dir\ /FS -c C:\Users\ares\source\repos\neovim\build\CMakeFiles\CMakeScratch\TryCompile-dkvt3o\testCCompiler.c
    [2/2] C:\Windows\system32\cmd.exe /C "cd . && C:\Strawberry\c\bin\cmake.exe -E vs_link_exe --intdir=CMakeFiles\cmTC_3e848.dir --rc=C:\PROGRA~2\WI3CF2~1\10\bin\100226~1.0\arm64\rc.exe --mt=C:\PROGRA~2\WI3CF2~1\10\bin\100226~1.0\arm64\mt.exe --manifests  -- C:\PROGRA~1\MICROS~1\2022\PROFES~1\VC\Tools\MSVC\1442~1.344\bin\HOSTAR~1\x64\link.exe /nologo CMakeFiles\cmTC_3e848.dir\testCCompiler.c.obj  /out:cmTC_3e848.exe /implib:cmTC_3e848.lib /pdb:cmTC_3e848.pdb /version:0.0 /machine:x64  /debug /INCREMENTAL /subsystem:console  kernel32.lib user32.lib gdi32.lib winspool.lib shell32.lib ole32.lib oleaut32.lib uuid.lib comdlg32.lib advapi32.lib && cd ."
    FAILED: cmTC_3e848.exe
    C:\Windows\system32\cmd.exe /C "cd . && C:\Strawberry\c\bin\cmake.exe -E vs_link_exe --intdir=CMakeFiles\cmTC_3e848.dir --rc=C:\PROGRA~2\WI3CF2~1\10\bin\100226~1.0\arm64\rc.exe --mt=C:\PROGRA~2\WI3CF2~1\10\bin\100226~1.0\arm64\mt.exe --manifests  -- C:\PROGRA~1\MICROS~1\2022\PROFES~1\VC\Tools\MSVC\1442~1.344\bin\HOSTAR~1\x64\link.exe /nologo CMakeFiles\cmTC_3e848.dir\testCCompiler.c.obj  /out:cmTC_3e848.exe /implib:cmTC_3e848.lib /pdb:cmTC_3e848.pdb /version:0.0 /machine:x64  /debug /INCREMENTAL /subsystem:console  kernel32.lib user32.lib gdi32.lib winspool.lib shell32.lib ole32.lib oleaut32.lib uuid.lib comdlg32.lib advapi32.lib && cd ."
    LINK Pass 1: command "C:\PROGRA~1\MICROS~1\2022\PROFES~1\VC\Tools\MSVC\1442~1.344\bin\HOSTAR~1\x64\link.exe /nologo CMakeFiles\cmTC_3e848.dir\testCCompiler.c.obj /out:cmTC_3e848.exe /implib:cmTC_3e848.lib /pdb:cmTC_3e848.pdb /version:0.0 /machine:x64 /debug /INCREMENTAL /subsystem:console kernel32.lib user32.lib gdi32.lib winspool.lib shell32.lib ole32.lib oleaut32.lib uuid.lib comdlg32.lib advapi32.lib /MANIFEST /MANIFESTFILE:CMakeFiles\cmTC_3e848.dir/intermediate.manifest CMakeFiles\cmTC_3e848.dir/manifest.res" failed (exit code 1120) with the following output:
    testCCompiler.c.obj : error LNK2001: unresolved external symbol _RTC_InitBase
    testCCompiler.c.obj : error LNK2001: unresolved external symbol _RTC_Shutdown
    LINK : error LNK2001: unresolved external symbol mainCRTStartup
    C:\Program Files (x86)\Windows Kits\10\\lib\10.0.22621.0\\um\arm64\kernel32.lib : warning LNK4272: library machine type 'ARM64' conflicts with target machine type 'x64'
    C:\Program Files (x86)\Windows Kits\10\\lib\10.0.22621.0\\um\arm64\user32.lib : warning LNK4272: library machine type 'ARM64' conflicts with target machine type 'x64'
    C:\Program Files (x86)\Windows Kits\10\\lib\10.0.22621.0\\um\arm64\gdi32.lib : warning LNK4272: library machine type 'ARM64' conflicts with target machine type 'x64'
    C:\Program Files (x86)\Windows Kits\10\\lib\10.0.22621.0\\um\arm64\winspool.lib : warning LNK4272: library machine type 'ARM64' conflicts with target machine type 'x64'
    C:\Program Files (x86)\Windows Kits\10\\lib\10.0.22621.0\\um\arm64\shell32.lib : warning LNK4272: library machine type 'ARM64' conflicts with target machine type 'x64'
    C:\Program Files (x86)\Windows Kits\10\\lib\10.0.22621.0\\um\arm64\ole32.lib : warning LNK4272: library machine type 'ARM64' conflicts with target machine type 'x64'
    C:\Program Files (x86)\Windows Kits\10\\lib\10.0.22621.0\\um\arm64\oleaut32.lib : warning LNK4272: library machine type 'ARM64' conflicts with target machine type 'x64'
    C:\Program Files (x86)\Windows Kits\10\\lib\10.0.22621.0\\um\arm64\uuid.lib : warning LNK4272: library machine type 'ARM64' conflicts with target machine type 'x64'
    C:\Program Files (x86)\Windows Kits\10\\lib\10.0.22621.0\\um\arm64\comdlg32.lib : warning LNK4272: library machine type 'ARM64' conflicts with target machine type 'x64'
    C:\Program Files (x86)\Windows Kits\10\\lib\10.0.22621.0\\um\arm64\advapi32.lib : warning LNK4272: library machine type 'ARM64' conflicts with target machine type 'x64'
    C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\2022\Professional\VC\Tools\MSVC\14.42.34433\lib\ARM64\MSVCRTD.lib : warning LNK4272: library machine type 'ARM64' conflicts with target machine type 'x64'
    C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\2022\Professional\VC\Tools\MSVC\14.42.34433\lib\ARM64\OLDNAMES.lib : warning LNK4272: library machine type 'ARM64' conflicts with target machine type 'x64'
    cmTC_3e848.exe : fatal error LNK1120: 3 unresolved externals
    ninja: build stopped: subcommand failed.





  CMake will not be able to correctly generate this project.
Call Stack (most recent call first):
  CMakeLists.txt:12 (project)


-- Configuring incomplete, errors occurred!
```

### Steps to reproduce

N/A

### Expected behavior

build success

### Nvim version (nvim -v)

N/A

### Vim (not Nvim) behaves the same?

N/A

### Operating system/version

Windows 11

### Terminal name/version

Windows Terminal

### $TERM environment variable

N/A

### Installation

N/A

comment_data.body:
Oops, looks like there's something wrong with strawberry bundled CMake. I can get native build artifacts by using the official CMake.

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/f5c1e21f-c457-49d9-acc8-b82aebd443dc)

labels.description: building and installing Neovim using the provided scripts
labels.name: build

title: Build failed on a native Windows ARM64
